patthana5.1:2.1: Kusalaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana5.1:3.1: Akusalaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana5.1:4.1: Abyākataṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana5.1:5.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ …pe… sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ.)
patthana5.1:6.1: Kusalo sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo kusalassa sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana5.1:7.1: Akusalo sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo akusalassa sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana5.1:8.1: Abyākato sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo abyākatassa sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana5.1:9.1: Kusalo sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo kusalassa sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana5.1:10.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā satta, anantare samanantare pañca, sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, āsevane tīṇi, kamme pañca, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre …pe… sampayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana5.1:12.1: Akusalaṃ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana5.1:13.1: Akusalaṃ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (1)
patthana5.1:14.1: Abyākataṃ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana5.1:15.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) (Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ.)
patthana5.1:16.1: Akusalo dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo akusalassa dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana5.1:17.1: Akusalo dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo akusalassa dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana5.1:18.1: Abyākato dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo akusalassa dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana5.1:19.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā ekaṃ, anantare …pe… nissaye dve, upanissaye cattāri, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme tīṇi, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre indriye dve, jhāne magge ekaṃ, sampayutte …pe… avigate dve. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana5.1:21.1: Kusalaṃ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana5.1:22.1: Akusalaṃ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana5.1:23.1: Abyākataṃ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana5.1:24.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana5.1:26.1: Kusalo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo kusalassa adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana5.1:27.1: Akusalo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo akusalassa adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)

patthana5.1:29.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā satta, anantare satta …pe… sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, āsevane tīṇi, kamme pañca, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre …pe… sampayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:32.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.1:36.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana5.1:38.1: Kusalo vipākadhammadhammo kusalassa vipākadhammadhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana5.1:39.1: Akusalo vipākadhammadhammo akusalassa vipākadhammadhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana5.1:40.1: Kusalo vipākadhammadhammo kusalassa vipākadhammadhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Kusalo vipākadhammadhammo akusalassa vipākadhammadhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (2)
patthana5.1:41.1: Akusalo vipākadhammadhammo akusalassa vipākadhammadhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Akusalo vipākadhammadhammo kusalassa vipākadhammadhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (2) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana5.1:42.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare dve …pe… sahajāte dve, aññamaññe nissaye dve, upanissaye cattāri, āsevane kamme dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana5.1:44.1: Abyākataṃ nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana5.1:45.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana5.1:47.1: Abyākataṃ upādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato upādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana5.1:50.1: Kusalaṃ anupādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana5.1:51.1: Akusalaṃ anupādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana5.1:55.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana5.1:57.1: Kusalo anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo kusalassa anupādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana5.1:62.1: Abyākato anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo abyākatassa anupādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana5.1:63.1: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare samanantare pañca, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye upanissaye nava, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane tīṇi, kamme …pe… magge satta, sampayutte vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate ekādasa. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana5.1:65.1: Kusalaṃ anupādinnaanupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)

patthana5.1:67.1: Hetuyā dve …pe… āsevane ekaṃ …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṃkhittaṃ, sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.1:283.1: Kusalaṃ ajjhattārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana5.1:284.1: Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana5.1:285.1: Kusalaṃ bahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana5.1:286.1: Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana5.1:287.1: Abyākataṃ anidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana5.1:290.1: Kusalaṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo anidassanaappaṭigho ca abyākato anidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
patthana5.1:291.1: Akusalaṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana5.1:292.1: Abyākataṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana5.1:293.1: Kusalaṃ anidassanaappaṭighañca abyākataṃ anidassanaappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana5.1:294.1: Akusalaṃ anidassanaappaṭighañca abyākataṃ anidassanaappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana5.1:295.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)
